channel.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
channel.description: never download kasperky anti virus cause it did a automatic shut down on my comp dont belive me if you want but its true trust me kasperky is nothing but travel i was going to play world of warcraft like usueal and kasperky kept on popping out saying stuff like (allow firefox.exe) and slow by slow kasperky was eating my computer memory while i was noticing until i head to delete half of my files and items all that was left in my desktop was firefox,multitranse and chinese checkers online p.s i had to buy another comp cause my other comp would never turn on again

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

moparisthebest:

I have been using it ever since I started using the internet, and have not got a virus yet.

So I’m guessing you don’t know about the scream?

Read full topic
item.source: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

YourDistracted:

Well i have windows and i almost never use my antivirus. I have never had a virus.

Ever heard of Automatic Protection? There is no way you could do without an antivir on the internet for any decent amount of time without getting a virus.

Read full topic

@1m_3m0 wrote:

i use avast and i have no viruses at all… that i know of. but heres a tip don’t download programs like games or anything from lime wire or frost wire or anything like that… i had spy ware and ad ware (so very annoying) so far I’ve had to re-install windows twice >.<

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

regecks`:

I use windows and I don’t get any viruses (without an AV) either. It has nothing to do with your OS, it’s got all to do with you’re all gullible douches.

I’ll sign on that.

Read full topic

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

MybJames:

oh ma god lothy, viruses can attach themselves to other windows processes or w/e

That sounds more like trojans.

moparisthebest:

Yes I use linux now, but in the past I have used nothing but windows and still never get any viruses, all thanks to common sense.

I use some common sence, but sometimes I take a leap and accidentally get one.

Read full topic

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

It takes little common sense to identify a virus lel. It’s not something to jump up and down about. :rolleyes: “Boy oh boy! I know that this .scr file is a virus!”

Read full topic
item.source: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus

item.title: Why you should never download kasperky anti virus
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

regecks`:

I use windows and I don’t get any viruses (without an AV) either. It has nothing to do with your OS, it’s got all to do with you’re all gullible douches.

Sactly. Bitdefender tends to help it too

Many people see the reassuring label: ‘THIS ISN’T A VIRUS!!!1!11!’ so they download it. Minutes later, their computer is lying on the floor, struggling to breathe. They wonder where the virus came from.

Here’s a hint: Unplug your power cable, pick up your computer, and throw it off a tall cliff (preferably one with jagged rocks below). When the computer is about half way down, jump off and try to save it.

Read full topic
